thread.title: Warriors coach Steve Kerr to take leave of absence
thread.title_full: Warriors coach Steve Kerr to take leave of absence

title: Warriors coach Steve Kerr to take leave of absence
text: > Sports Warriors coach Steve Kerr to take leave of absence FILE - In this Wednesday, June 10, 2015 file photo, Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr listens to a question during a press conference following Game 3 of basketball's NBA Finals against the Cleveland Cavaliers in Cleveland. Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr will take a leave of absence as he recovers from back surgery and will be replaced on an interim basis by Luke Walton. The Warriors announced Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015 that Kerr will need time off for rehabilitation and recovery. (AP Photo/Tony Dejak, File)
